parameters.name: AutoSnapshotPolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the automatic snapshot policy.

parameters.name: AutoSnapshotPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the automatic snapshot policy.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the automatic snapshot policy. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group. If this parameter is specified to query resources, up to 1,000 resources that belong to the specified resource group can be displayed in the response.

> Resources in the default resource group are displayed in the response regardless of how this parameter is set.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the automatic snapshot policy.
